name: Azan - Blue Connecticut - RobustoÂ
additionalNotes: The Azan Blue Connecticut line is made with a Connecticut seed wrapper grown in our Fincas Azan farm in Ecuador. Our Connecticut wrapper is very silky and smooth, with hints of sweetness, which makes a wonderful match with the mild tobacco fillers from Jalapa in Nicaragua. This is the same great cigar packed in the Green Plain Liberal packaging with the original cigar band underneath.
